nodes.text: The Y'Toub system, sometimes referred to as the Nal Hutta system or Nar Shaddaa system, was a star system located at the center of the Hutt trade world in Hutt Space, and it contained the planet of Nal Hutta and its moon, Nar Shaddaa. It contained a yellow star and a total of six planets, four of which were habitable.
